metadata.title: CVE-2017-7654 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In Eclipse Mosquitto 1.4.15 and earlier, a Memory Leak vulnerability wasfound within the Mosquitto Broker. Unauthenticated clients can send craftedCONNECT packets which could cause a denial of service in the MosquittoBroker.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7654` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmosquitto1 - 1.5.4-1
libmosquittopp1 - 1.5.4-1
mosquitto - 1.5.4-1
mosquitto-clients - 1.5.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mosquitto package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.4-1').
